summary: Retextures of Maty743's magnificent Bosmer Armor Pack
descriptionHtml:
*If you enjoy these retextures let me know! I'd love to see some screenshots from better rigs too!*

First off let me state that I love the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37289/]Bosmer Armor Pack[/url] by Maty743. The Nexus really needs more mods like it, they are few and far between.

Secondly I need to state that this retex REQUIRES the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37289/]Bosmer Armor Pack[/url] by Maty743.

Thirdly if you have seen my other mod [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32151]Ashland Apparel[/url] you should understand why I made this. Preferably I like my equipment used and incredibly broken in. Apparently I have the same mindset in Skyrim.

With that being said I am not pumping out AMB quality sets, originally all of these were worked on for personal use and I thought to share them. If you don't like dirty, grimy, or worn out armors then you're in the wrong place. Maty743's original textures are awesome regardless. I just tinker.




--------------------INSTALL INFO--------------------
1. Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37289/]Bosmer Armor Pack[/url] by Maty743
2. Download the main file (Either NMM or Manually, preferably through NMM)
3. If Downloading Manually - Unzip into your Skyrim>data folder
4. If Downloading through NMM just activate and you're good.




--------------------NOTES--------------------

This is an ongoing WIP of all the armors of the pack, as they are completed or in WIP stages they will be uploaded as standalones. When all are completed they will be zipped into one file.

If you have any questions feel free to send me a PM, I cannot and will not distribute, rebrand, or grant permission against the wishes of the original content creator, it is best that you go through him. Refer to the Permissions tab.

--------------------PROGRESS--------------------
Bosmer Plain Armor
>Cuirass - Done
>Gloves - Done
>Boots - Done
>Hood - Done
>Shoulder Cape - Done

Bosmer Elder Armor
>Cuirass - Done
>Gloves - Done
>Boots - Done
>Hood - Done
>Helmet - Done
>Helmet & Hood - Done
>Shoulder Cape - Done

Bosmer Heavy Armor
*IN PROGRESS*

Wild Hunt Armor Heavy
*COMING SOON*

Wild Hunt Armor Light
*COMING SOON*


--------------------CREDITS--------------------

Bethesda for an awesome 10 years and childhood.
Maty743, Arynn and Isilmeriels.
